18150775.count: Congo, Democratic Republic of,CONGO, DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF

repnme.cdata!: Zaire - Shaba Power System Rehabilitation Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Shaba Power System Rehabilitation
            Project will rehabilitate the electrical generating stations
            and the transmission and distribution system of the Shaba
            region to minimize the risk of failure of the supply of
            energy to the mining industry and particularly to Gecamines.
            Subsequent maintenance will be supported under the project
            by provision of vehicles, small equipment and spare parts,
            and a reserve for unforeseen repairs. SNEL's financial
            management and its planning, operating, and maintenance
            capabilities will be strengthened by the services of
            long-term technical experts. The Shaba Power System
            Rehabilitation Project will also include the services of
            consultants for project implementation; energy policy
            formulation; and studies of training needs and the
            electricity tariff structure.

docna.cdata!: Zaire - Shaba Power System Rehabilitation Project

display_title.display_title:
Zaire - Shaba Power System
            Rehabilitation Project
